dcterms:description: The LIDC-IDRI dataset is the largest publicly available dataset for lung nodule detection and annotation, consisting of 1,018 cases of diagnostic and lung cancer screening thoracic CT scans with marked-up annotated lesions by four experienced thoracic radiologists.
dcterms:title: LIDC-IDRI
